vote.title: To authorize an amendment to the 2022 Capital Improvement Budget; to authorize a transfer of cash and appropriation between projects within the Sanitary Bond Fund; to authorize the Director of Public Utilities to enter into a contract with CDM Smith for the Southerly WWTP Control System Improvements project; to authorize the expenditure of up to $917,700.00 from the Sanitary Bond Fund to pay for the project; and to declare an emergency.   ($917,700.00)
vote.description: This item was approved on the Consent Agenda.
